author: Mike Terry
comment: Never would install. Just keeps saying download pending...

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: This is weird. Have you tried restarting the watch? Or contact us we will see what we can do.

author: Joseph Goble
comment: Pretty sweet, but I wish we could see the date. That's honestly why I bought the paid version. Maybe stick it down where credit is mm/dd?

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: We did an update to show date, but we don't want to make the watch face too crowded. So when you tap to fire, the score will show date and stop blinking. Tap again or when watch went into ambient mode the time will be shown again. Hope you like the new build!

title: No date?

author: Bri Robertson
comment: Great homage to a classic game !!
title: Nice app....

author: James hickey
comment: Been looking for a space invaders themed watch face and this one's the dogs *******!! Thanks guys.
title: Retro Heaven

author: Eric Van DeMark
comment: Seriously, I love the attention to detail you put into this watch face. The only thing I would ask for is maybe have a black and white version and maybe a couple of those barriers as well :) great job dev  Response: yeah white sprites with black background. Maybe barriers that are white or green? :)

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: We added a new black & white theme in version 1.9!

title: What Taito should be releasing

author: Drew Clarke
comment: The only request I would make is that there is an option for a plain black background! Otherwise love the style and options.. edited in response to dev question: just aesthetics.. though a monochrome option would be cool too!

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: In 1.9, we added a new black & white theme! And you are right - they looks amazing!
